original_text: It will be very bad for you, teachers of God's Law and Pharisees. You are hypocrites! You always clean the outside of your cups and plates very carefully. You only clean the outside part that people can see. But on the inside, everything is still dirty. Inside you, your minds are full of bad thoughts. You want to have more things for yourself. You hurt other people to get what you want.
korean_text: 화 있을진저 외식하는 서기관들과 바리새인들이여 잔과 대접의 겉은 깨끗이 하되 그 안에는 탐욕과 방탕으로 가득하게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: It will be very bad for you
sentences.korean_translation: 너희에게는 매우 나쁜 일이 닥칠 것이다

sentences.original_text: teachers of God's Law and Pharisees
You always clean the outside of your cups and plates
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 항상 잔과 접시의 겉면을 깨끗하게 한다

sentences.original_text: You always clean the outside of your cups and plates very carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 잔과 접시의 겉면을 매우 조심스럽게 깨끗하게 한다

sentences.original_text: You only clean the outside part
your minds are full of bad thoughts
sentences.korean_translation: 마음이 나쁜 생각으로 가득 차 있다

sentences.original_text: You want to have more things for yourself
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 자신을 위해 더 많은 것을 갖고 싶어한다

sentences.original_text: You hurt other people to get what you want
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 원하는 것을 얻기 위해 다른 사람들을 해치고 있다
